name: tm56
effect: Teaches Fling to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Fling to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user flings its held item at the foe to attack. Its power and effects depend on the item.
flavor_text.platinum: The user flings its held item at the foe to attack. Its power and effects depend on the item.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user flings its held item at the foe to attack. Its power and effects depend on the item.
